 import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../../models/movie'; import {IMAGES_SIZES} from '../../constants/images-sizes' @Component({ selector: 'movie-item', templateUrl: './movie-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./movie-item.component.scss'] }) export class MovieItemComponent implements OnInit { @Input() itemData: Movie | null = null; imag constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
